Paul Gallen and Mark Carroll have engaged in a nasty slanging match over Bronson Xerris positive drug test.

articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: Hamilton “overcome with rage“ by events in USA - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Formula 1 World Champion Lewis Hamilton has expressed his latest thoughts following clashes between the authorities and peaceful anti-racism protestors in the USA – and says that he has been “overcome with rage”.
articles.content:
The death of George Floyd in Minneapolis on May 25 has put a renewed focus on racial injustice, and there have been protests and violent clashes with the authorities in many major US cities.
On Sund… [+2349 chars]
